named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: select date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') mes , count(*) total from venda where data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and status = 'EMITIDA' group by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') desc

named-native-query.name: Vendas.situcaoEstoque
named-native-query.query: SELECT SUM(c.quantidade_estoque) - (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(quantidade), 0) FROM item_venda LEFT JOIN venda v on item_venda.codigo_venda = v.codigo WHERE v.status = 'EMITIDA') AS itens_estoque, SUM(c.valor * (c.quantidade_estoque - (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(quantidade), 0) FROM item_venda LEFT JOIN venda v on item_venda.codigo_venda = v.codigo WHERE v.status = 'EMITIDA'))) AS valor_estoque FROM cerveja c
